# HUD::GET_BLIP_INFO_ID_TYPE

## Summary
Report if seen

## Parameters
* **BLIP_INDEX** blipId

## Returns
* **eRADAR_BLIP_TYPE**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Returns a value based on what the blip is attached to
1 - Vehicle
2 - Ped
3 - Object
4 - Coord
5 - unk
6 - Pickup
7 - Radius
